name: ABDay-CMSdaytracker
0:
”Alexa ask cms ab day about tomorrow”
”Alexa ask cms ab day how I should pack”
”Is next Tuesday an a day?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. m. s. a. b. day
des:
This skill tells you whether it is an a day or a b day based on the CMS calendar. 

You can ask about any day of the year, such as today, tomorrow, next Tuesday, or October 5th.

One of the most confusing situations for A/B days is make-up days and this skill handles that just like any normal day!

This skill can also tell you if school is canceled, however you should still check official sources before not going to school.

This skill is NOT made by CMS, it is an unofficial tool made by a fellow CMS student. CMS can make weird and unpredictable decisions sometimes and while this app tries to account for as much as it can, there is always a possibility that it gets something wrong, so if a teacher or CMS gives information contradicting this, then listen to that information first!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
